name: iCatch Marketing LLC
description:
iCatch Marketing™ is designed to bring brand and product messages to one of the last untapped medias at point of sale and point of activity venues.
iCatch Marketing gives you the opportunity to advertise in a new, innovative and trend-setting way. It supports communication with new and potential customers. It is the opportunity to advertise on-premise and point of sale in a highly cost-efficient and persuasive way.
